titleStmt.title: A bundle of myrrhe: or Three meditations of teares The first in the effect. pag.1. Last in the cause of Dauids teares. Psal. 42.3 pag. 270. The middle, and most intended, of religious teares in general. p. 96. The particulars whereof, are prefixed to each page, and principall section.
Bundle of myrrhe.
titleStmt.author: Innes, William, fl. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Mylbourne, and are to be sold at his shop at the great South doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: The words "first in the effect .. teares in general. p. 96." are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
